text: @RealSaavedra Are you FREAKING KIDDING ME ! @BillGates the CCP locked down 60 million of their own people some of who died in their homes.. They arrested people on the street, disappeared those who spoke out and let COVID19 loose on the rest of the world... What about that was RIGHT!?!?
